resources.string:
Step 1: Email us at info@glimpseframe.com with your desired address. We recommend that it include your last name.

 Step 2: We'll respond within 24 hours with its availability confirmation. If it is not available, feel free to propose another one.

 Step 3: If we confirm that your requested address is available, click "Received Confirmation" below.
Enter your new email below. Only do so if you\'ve received confirmation from our team, otherwise your frame may stop working!
User data not found. Please, contact technical support.
Enter valid and confirmed email address.

Very long text about how it works: as;dkj
